title: Salesforce LMTS offer
content:
Education: Computer Science Tier 1 College (NonIIT)
Years of Experience: 10.5 Years
Prior Experience: Tier 2 Company NonFaang

Date of the Offer: March 2024
Company: Salesforce
Title/Level: LMTS
Location: Hyderabad
Salary: 80 Lac Base, 15% Variable
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 0
Stock bonus: 180K USD / 4 years
Bonus: 0
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 80 lac + 12 lac + 38 lac = 1.3 cr
Benefits: Salesforce benefits
Other details: No competing offers and laid off from the company hence my previous TC was 0

I got rejected from
Amazon (rejected in first round) - ghosted by recruiter
Microsoft (no update after 1 month) - ghosted by recruiter
Google (4th round) -> Great experience so far even i rejected!! So much i learned from all rounds. Happy Here
Coupang (6th round i got rejected after 1 month of interview loop :() -> heartbroken
Wayfair (1st round) 
ServiceNow (1st round) 0> Left interview in 20 mins as interviewer was not listening. 
Atlassian (3rd round) -> all went pretty good but was ghosted by recruiter (2nd try in 4 months)
Coinbase (1st round)


So i want to tell you guys one thing don't lose hope and keep on persisting inspite things don't go your way.
I was expecting coupang offer for sure but did not get and was also positive on Microsoft. Not sure on Salesforce but got the offer. Hence there is a hope for everyone. Just keep doing & take a break if you feel fatigued. The road is very long but you are not alone.

My family was with me in very tough times and they sacrificed a lot for me. I am not gonna forget and they are my first priority. Even as a failed person they accepted me and there is no difference pre and post this offer. I realized i had everything even without job.

Interview exp : https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-experience/5114952/Salesforce-LMTS-interview-experience
